name: Demong Hunter 3
description:
Breakthrough Dungeon Action fantasy "Demong Hunter" The third successive work of the series, the latest successor.

★ Game introduction ★
"Demong Hunter" is an action game that focuses on the fun of control, shooting, shooting and avoiding control.
Hunters who strive to recover peace by defeating "demong" which is "bug" generated from the virtual world created by the cyber brain, is a story of "Mercenary Kayla" with outstanding ability among them.

★ Main features ★
A game with ending that can be enjoyed short and fairly.
Defeat demongs that play more intelligent play - Go for "ending" go!
Huhuhu ~ Well, being "ending" this time is true! Is it?
Equipment / Character / Card withdrawal none.
No auto play. Just a game with just control!
Support real time / multiplayer cooperation mode !!!
"Team play" of short-range communication using Wi-Fi is possible.
Feel friendship while defeating the mighty demon with friends!
Support global ranking system !!!
If you are a strong player of control play, try trying "world best ranking"!
Controller support
If it is a control game, basically support! In the case of

★ Support language ★
English, 中文, 中國, 日本語, 한국어, ไทย, tiếng việt, Bahasa Indonesia

In-app advertisement, there is charge.
Please inquire about games on bulletin boards or e-mails.
Please note that deleting data when uninstall the game, you can not recover.

When downloading ask for the following authority.
Save (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) - Used to save and verify player information.
Contact (GET_ACCOUNTS) - Used by the player for selective advertising viewing function.
